```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#e4e4e4", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))

wk_post <- tibble(
  
"eCampus" = c(unchecked, 
              unchecked, 
              unchecked,
              unchecked),

"Slack" = c(checked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            checked),

Description = c("Introduce yourself in Slack under `#introduce-yourself`",
                "Verify your Qualtrics account",
                "Review the website",
                "Draw an Evaluation"),

Location = c("[Link](/assignment/01-assignment/#class-slack-account-access)",
             "[Link](/assignment/01-assignment/#verify-qualtrics-account-login)",
             "[Link](/readings/01-readings/#review-the-rest)",
             "[Link](/assignment/01-assignment/#drawing-evaluations)")

)
```
